inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Handaxe', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Battleaxe', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Waraxe', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Greataxe', 'CriticalChance', 5); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Expert Training, Axes
description: You gain an additional +5 chance to inflict critical hits with handaxes, battleaxes, waraxes, and greataxes.
